about_the_game:
🏰Game Overview

🗡️Become an adventurer and explore the perilous and seductive "Dungeons"!

👥In the bustling "Sleepless City of Runeheim", gather allies and create your ideal party to conquer challenges.

💫Discover a wealth of equipment with random effects, hidden within the dungeons!

💎Over 10,000 weapons and skills await—use them all to unearth the treasure buried deep within the dungeon!

🎮Features

💕 Enticing Adventures with Curvaceous Female Adventurers!💕

Many female adventurers live in Runeheim!

You’re free to seduce, hypnotize, or build a loving relationship with them.

Over 46 erotic scenes!

Includes more than 140 HCG illustrations!

⚔️ Not Just Another RPG—Experience Innovative Combat with Skill Gacha!⚔️

Skills available to characters change with every turn during battles.

Will you unlock a powerful skill next turn, or will your skills be sealed? It's all down to luck!

In these unpredictable battles, even the gods can’t foresee the outcome. Show your true strength!

🌈 Endless Content After the Ending🌈

Your adventure doesn’t end when the game does—it truly begins after the ending!

Tackle infinite dungeons with strategic mastery and push your limits!

⚙️Systems

📖 Event Replay Mode

Revisit viewed H-scenes and CGs anytime.

Unlock all unseen events if you prefer.

👗 Character Viewer Mode

Customize characters' expressions, outfits, and backgrounds, and admire them freely.

Edit text to display your own customized dialogues.

🤖 Auto-Battle Mode

Perfect for those looking to save time or skip battles.

High-performance AI allows you to automate battles with flexible settings:

Full auto, partial auto, or auto against weaker enemies only.

👊 Best Equipment System

Customize the criteria for best equipment (Attack Type, Magic Type, Defense Type).

Switch all party members' gear to their optimal setup with one button.

🎯 Cheat Mode

For players who prefer to skip the grind, the following features are included:

Skip dungeon clearing and mark it as completed.

Disable dungeon tiles to bypass obstacles easily.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual contents such as sexual acts and sexual violence, non-consensual sex, sex with monsters/tentacles, BDSM. Please consider play or not.

detailed_description:
🏰Game Overview

🗡️Become an adventurer and explore the perilous and seductive "Dungeons"!

👥In the bustling "Sleepless City of Runeheim", gather allies and create your ideal party to conquer challenges.

💫Discover a wealth of equipment with random effects, hidden within the dungeons!

💎Over 10,000 weapons and skills await—use them all to unearth the treasure buried deep within the dungeon!

Many female adventurers live in Runeheim!

You’re free to seduce, hypnotize, or build a loving relationship with them.

Skills available to characters change with every turn during battles.

In these unpredictable battles, even the gods can’t foresee the outcome. Show your true strength!

subs.option_text: Dungeon Desire: The Sleepless City of Runeheim - $13.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Dungeon Desire: The Sleepless City of Runeheim

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Become an adventurer and explore the perilous and seductive "Dungeons"! In the bustling "Sleepless City of Runeheim", gather allies and create your ideal party to conquer challenges. Discover a wealth of equipment with random effects, hidden within the dungeons!
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
